name: Apricot-Sage Chicken with Carrots
ingredients: boneless chicken thighs, unsalted chicken stock, apricot preserves, dijon mustard, sliced carrots, fresh sage, unsalted butter
steps: Combine stock, apricot preserves, and mustard in a bowl, stirring with a whisk. Spoon pan sauce over chicken; sprinkle with remaining 1 teaspoon sage
